plugins.name: 图形透视变换 Perspective Transform
plugins.description:
介绍

图形透视变换是一个强大的 Figma 插件，专为设计师打造，帮助您轻松实现矢量图形的透视变形。通过直观的界面和灵活的控制，您可以快速调整图形的四个角点，创造出专业级的设计效果。


功能说明

  1. 实时透视调整：通过拖动四个角点，实时调整矢量图形的透视效果。
  2. 精确控制：基于相对比例定位，确保变形的精准性和一致性。
  3. 自动更新：选择新的图形时，插件自动重新计算并定位角点。
  4. 重置功能：一键恢复图形到初始状态，方便反复调整。
  5. 兼容多种图形：支持矩形及简单的四边形矢量图形。


使用方法

  1. 在 Figma 中选择一个矩形或四边形矢量图形。
  2. 运行透视变换（专业版）插件。
  3. 在插件界面中，拖动四个角点以调整图形的透视效果。
  4. 点击“重置”按钮可将图形恢复到原始状态。
  5. 观察 Figma 中的图形实时更新，直至达到满意的设计效果。


注意事项

  1. 仅支持简单的四边形路径，复杂路径可能无法正确解析。
  2. 在使用插件前，建议备份原始图形以防止数据丢失。
  3. 插件当前版本不支持曲线或多路径的矢量图形。
  4. 确保 Figma 已更新到最新版本，以获得最佳使用体验。


Introduction

Perspective Transform Pro is a powerful Figma plugin designed for designers to effortlessly achieve perspective transformations on vector graphics. With an intuitive interface and flexible controls, you can quickly adjust the four corner points of your graphics to create professional-grade design effects.


Function Description

  1. Real-Time Perspective Adjustment: Manipulate the four corner points to adjust the perspective of vector graphics in real-time.
  2. Precise Control: Based on relative proportions, ensuring accuracy and consistency in transformations.
  3. Automatic Updates: Automatically recalculates and repositions corner points when selecting new graphics.
  4. Reset Functionality: One-click reset to restore graphics to their original state for easy adjustments.
  5. Compatibility with Various Shapes: Supports rectangles and simple quadrilateral vector graphics.


How to Use

  1. Select a rectangle or quadrilateral vector graphic in Figma.
  2. Run the Perspective Transform Pro plugin.
  3. In the plugin interface, drag the four corner points to adjust the perspective effect.
  4. Click the "Reset" button to restore the graphic to its original state.
  5. Observe the graphic in Figma updating in real-time until you achieve the desired design effect.


Precautions

  1. Supports only simple quadrilateral paths; complex paths may not parse correctly.
  2. It is recommended to backup original graphics before using the plugin to prevent data loss.
  3. The current version does not support curved or multi-path vector graphics.
  4. Ensure Figma is updated to the latest version for the best user experience.

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact me at kingweichueng@qq.com.

plugins.tagline: Advanced Perspective Transformation for Designers

plugins.name: Figma to Scabld
plugins.description:
Effortlessly Import Your Figma Designs into Scabld!


Transform your designs into mobile apps in no time with the Scabld plugin for Figma. Seamlessly bring your Figma screens into Scabld and move from design to a fully functional mobile app without any coding required. Our plugin automatically adapts your design to Scabld's no-code platform, so you can focus on turning your vision into reality.


How to use this plugin


1. Install the free Figma plugin.

2. Select your Figma designs.

3. Import them directly into Scabld.

4. Continue editing and customizing just like in Figma.

5. Add interactions and animations.

6. Finalize and publish your mobile app with zero code.


With Scabld, skip the hassle of manual conversions. Simply import your Figma files into our no-code platform and turn them into fully functional mobile apps. We preserve your layer names and design structure, making it easy to pick up where you left off and enhance your creations for a smooth user experience.


Preserve your layer structure.

When you import your designs, all your Figma groups and layer names are kept intact. This allows you to refine, adjust, and polish your app directly in Scabld without losing any important details.


Performance and optimization guaranteed.

When you publish with Scabld, we ensure your mobile app is optimized for peak performance across all devices. Every file is tuned for a fast and smooth experience, providing a high-quality result without compromising speed.


To learn more about Scabld and explore our other features, visit scabld.com.
plugins.tagline: Import your Figma designs into Scabld effortlessly.

plugins.name: md格式转设计稿 Markdown to Frame
plugins.description:
Introduction

This plugin allows users to convert Markdown text into fully structured Figma frames automatically, enhancing design workflows and documentation processes.


Function Description

The plugin parses Markdown syntax and creates corresponding Figma frames and text elements, supporting headings, lists, bold text, and horizontal rules. It ensures that all content is visually organized according to Markdown structuring.


Usage Method

Simply input your Markdown text into the provided text area in the plugin’s UI and click the ‘Convert Markdown’ button. The formatted content will appear as structured frames within your current Figma file.


Note

Ensure all text is properly formatted in Markdown before conversion. The frame width is fixed at 500px, but the height will adjust according to the content.


介绍

此插件允许用户将Markdown文本自动转换成完全结构化的Figma框架，增强设计工作流程和文档处理过程。


功能说明

插件解析Markdown语法，并创建相应的Figma框架和文本元素，支持标题、列表、加粗文本和水平规则。它确保所有内容都按照Markdown的结构进行视觉组织。


使用方法

只需在插件的用户界面中提供的文本区域中输入您的Markdown文本，然后点击“转换Markdown”按钮。格式化的内容将以结构化框架的形式出现在您当前的Figma文件中。


注意事项

确保在转换前所有文本都正确格式化为Markdown。框架宽度固定为500px，但高度将根据内容调整。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact me at kingweichueng@qq.com.

plugins.tagline: Transform Markdown into Structured Figma Frames

plugins.name: Text Harvest
plugins.description:
Text Harvest exports and updates text layers in bulk with a CSV file

Get a quick CSV file from your designs for your copywriting or localization team.


Export

  1. Make a selection or export the entire page if there's no selection
  2. The plugin export only the visible layers, and also ignore the duplicated ones
  3. You'll get a CSV file with layer names and its content
  4. You can skip text layers that you don't want to export by simply adding the symbol "!" at the beginning of the layer name


Update

  1. Make a selection or update the entire page if there's no selection
  2. Select the CSV file
  3. The plugin updates all the layers with the same name


Currently multicolumn CSV are not supported. If you need to translate to different languages, upload an independent CSV for each one
plugins.tagline: Export and updates text layers in bulk with a CSV file

plugins.name: ExportEase
plugins.description:
Transform your Figma design tokens into clean, organized code files that developers will love.

ExportEase bridges the gap between design and development by intelligently exporting your Figma variables and styles to 6 professional formats: CSS, SCSS, JavaScript, JSON, Dart, and Tailwind CSS.

🎯 Why ExportEase?

Smart Organization: Automatically creates separate files for each collection and mode (perfect for light/dark themes). No more messy, mixed token files.

Professional Output: Advanced sorting algorithm handles complex naming patterns - from simple numbering to semantic scales (xs, sm, md, lg, xl).

Developer-Ready: Generates production-quality code with proper formatting, comments, and import instructions. Variables are correctly formatted with fallbacks and references.

Effortless Workflow: One-click exports with ZIP downloads containing organized files and a helpful README with import instructions.

Multiple Formats for Every Stack:

CSS Custom Properties for modern web

SCSS Variables for preprocessing workflows

JavaScript ES6 modules with TypeScript support

JSON for any platform or documentation

Dart constants for Flutter development

Tailwind CSS config extensions ready to use

Perfect for:

✨ Design systems teams maintaining consistent tokens

✨ Developers who need clean, organized design token files

✨ Projects with multiple themes or brands

✨ Teams working across web, mobile, and Flutter platforms

The Result: Instead of manually copying variables or getting messy exports, you get perfectly organized, developer-friendly files that respect your Figma structure and naming conventions.

Export once, use everywhere. Your design tokens, exactly how your developers want them.
plugins.tagline: Transform design tokens into developer-ready code

139997.release_notes:
# 🚀 ExportEase - Advanced Design Token Exporter

## Transform Your Figma Variables into Production-Ready Code

**ExportEase** is the most comprehensive design token export plugin for Figma, enabling seamless integration between design and development workflows. Export your Figma variables and styles to multiple code formats with just a few clicks.

---

## ✨ **What's New in This Update**

### 🎯 **Direct Download Feature**
- **Skip the preview, get your files instantly!** New direct download option bypasses the preview step
- Click "Download Selected Files" and get your tokens immediately as individual files or ZIP archives
- Perfect for CI/CD workflows and rapid prototyping

### 🔧 **Enhanced Export Experience**
- **Smart file organization** - automatically groups exports by collections and modes
- **Comprehensive error handling** with detailed debugging information
- **Improved state management** - no more stuck buttons or broken workflows
- **Better performance** with optimized token collection and analysis

---

## 🎨 **Core Features**

### **📦 Multiple Export Formats**
- **CSS Custom Properties** - Perfect for modern web applications
- **Tailwind Config** - Ready-to-use Tailwind CSS theme configuration
- **JavaScript/TypeScript** - Import tokens directly into your JS/TS projects

### **🎛️ Flexible Export Options**
- **Variables Export** - Convert Figma variables (colors, spacing, typography, etc.)
- **Styles Export** - Export paint styles, text styles, and effect styles
- **Selective Export** - Choose exactly which files and collections you need
- **Batch Export** - Export all collections and modes in one ZIP file

### **🏗️ Smart Organization**
- **Collection-based grouping** - Each variable collection becomes a separate file
- **Mode support** - Light/dark themes, responsive breakpoints, brand variations
- **Intelligent naming** - Converts Figma names to valid CSS/JS variable names
- **Conflict resolution** - Handles duplicate names and edge cases gracefully

---

## 🛠️ **Perfect For**

### **👩‍💻 Developers**
- Eliminate manual token copying and reduce errors
- Get production-ready code that integrates seamlessly
- Support for modern frameworks (React, Vue, Angular, etc.)
- Compatible with design system tools and component libraries

### **🎨 Designers**
- Maintain design-development consistency automatically
- Share design decisions as usable code
- Streamline handoff process with developers
- Support complex design systems with multiple themes

### **🏢 Teams**
- Establish single source of truth for design tokens
- Scale design systems across multiple products
- Reduce design-development friction and iteration time
- Enable design system governance and consistency

---

## 🚀 **How It Works**

1. **📊 Analyze** - Plugin automatically detects your variables and styles
2. **🎯 Select** - Choose your export format (CSS, Tailwind, or JS)
3. **📁 Pick Files** - Select which collections and modes to export
4. **⬇️ Download** - Get your files instantly or preview before download

---

## 💡 **Use Cases**

### **🌙 Theme Systems**
Export light/dark mode variables as separate CSS files or combined Tailwind config

### **📱 Responsive Design**
Convert breakpoint-specific spacing and typography scales to code

### **🎨 Brand Systems**
Export brand-specific color palettes and typography for multi-brand applications

### **🧩 Component Libraries**
Generate design tokens for React, Vue, or Angular component libraries

### **📖 Documentation**
Create token documentation and style guides automatically

---

## 🔧 **Technical Specifications**

- **🔗 Zero Dependencies** - Works entirely within Figma, no external services
- **📦 Multiple Output Formats** - CSS, JavaScript, Tailwind CSS
- **🗂️ Smart File Organization** - Collection and mode-based structure
- **🛡️ Error Handling** - Comprehensive validation and user-friendly error messages
- **⚡ Performance Optimized** - Handles large design systems efficiently
- **🔄 Backward Compatible** - Works with existing Figma variable structures

---

## 🎯 **Keywords**
Design Tokens, CSS Variables, Tailwind CSS, Design System, Variables Export, Styles Export, Design-to-Code, Developer Tools, Design Handoff, Theme Export, Color Palette, Typography Scale, Spacing System

plugins.name: FrameFlex - Frame Resizer & Scaler
plugins.description:
🔹 FrameFlex – Smart Frame Resizing for Figma 🎯

Manually resizing frames can be a nightmare — especially when things break.

FrameFlex is a Figma plugin built to help you intelligently scale mobile frames, while preserving structure and layout integrity (when properly set up). ✨


Here’s what FrameFlex can do:


🔁 Multi-frame support – Resize multiple mobile frames in one action.

📱 Device presets – Quickly apply popular mobile screen sizes like iPhone, Android, and more.

📐 Layout-aware resizing – Maintains Auto Layout, constraints, and alignment — if your design is structured correctly.

🔤 Element scaling – Adjusts font size, spacing, strokes, and other properties proportionally.

🎯 Icon/vector protection – Prevents scaling on specific elements to avoid distortion.

⚙️ Rounding controls – Use smart, grid, or exact rounding for clean results.


💡 The more Auto Layout you use, the better the results will be.

FrameFlex works best when your design is clean, consistent, and fully built with Auto Layout in mind.


✅ Focused on mobile-first workflows.

⚠️ Support for other frame types depends on how well they're structured.
plugins.tagline: Resize multiple frames. Preserve structure. Stay consistent.

plugins.name: Figma to Unity Exporter
plugins.description:
### Tired of manually recreating your Figma designs in Unity?


Figma To Unity Importer is the ultimate workflow solution designed to bridge the gap between designers and developers. Stop wasting hours meticulously rebuilding UI and start converting your high-fidelity Figma designs into fully functional, native Unity uGUI components with just a few clicks.


**⚠️ IMPORTANT: This is one half of a powerful 2-part system.**

This Figma plugin exports your design data. To bring your designs to life in Unity, you need the professional importer asset from the Unity Asset Store.


---


### **➡️ Step 1: Get the Professional Unity Importer Asset**


To complete the workflow, please purchase and import the required companion asset from the Unity Asset Store. It's the engine that powers the entire import process in Unity, packed with advanced features to ensure a perfect conversion.


**[>> Get "Figma To Unity Importer" on the Unity Asset Store ($15) <<](https://assetstore.unity.com/preview/323342/1075296)**


---


### **✨ Key Features:**


* **Accurate Conversion:** Preserves layer hierarchy, names, positions, sizes, and rotations.

* **Advanced Text Support:** Exports text as TextMeshPro components, maintaining font family, **font weight (including variable fonts)**, size, and color.

* **Image Export:** Automatically exports image fills and creates native Unity `Image` components.

* **Resolution Scaling:** Scale your entire UI to different screen sizes automatically.

* **Smart & Simple UI:** Remembers your last used settings and supports multiple languages.


### **🚀 Workflow:**


**1. In Unity (Setup):**

* Purchase and import the importer from the Asset Store using the link above.

* Install the required packages as described in the asset's documentation (TextMeshPro, UI, Newtonsoft.Json).


**2. In Figma (Export):**

* Run this plugin.

* Select the single, top-level Frame you want to export.

* Configure your options (target resolution, include images, etc.).

* Click "Export" to download the `.zip` file.


**3. In Unity (Import):**

* Unzip the downloaded file.

* Drag the `FigmaExport` folder into your Unity `Assets`.

* Open the importer via `Tools > Figma Importer`.

* Assign the `hierarchy.json` file and click "Create UI".


That's it! Your design is now a native, ready-to-use UI in Unity.
plugins.tagline: The ultimate workflow bridge. Go from Figma design to a working Unity UI in minutes.

plugins.name: Detach variables
plugins.description:
Detacher – Take Full Control Over Figma Variables

Tired of wasting time manually detaching variables in Figma?

Detacher is your all-in-one utility to scan, preview, and detach variables from your selection — quickly, cleanly, and confidently.


✅ What Makes Detacher Better?


🔍 Visual Variable Summary

Get an instant snapshot of all the variables in your selection — Colors, Text, Numbers, Others — with live counts for total clarity.


🎯 Smart Selection Control

Choose exactly what to detach using simple checkboxes:

✔ Colors

✔ Text

✔ Numbers

✔ Others


🅰️ Full Typography Support

Detach all typography-related variables — including mixed styles and both string- and number-based properties


⚙️ How It Works

  1. Select your frame, group, or section in Figma.
  2. Launch the Detacher plugin.
  3. Pick the variable types you want to detach.
  4. (Optional) Preview changes.
  5. Hit Detach Variables → Done.


👩‍💻 Who Is Detacher For?

  1. Figma Power Users who want deeper control over variables.
  2. Design Engineers & Dev Designers looking to streamline their cleanup workflows.
  3. DesignOps & UI Librarians maintaining clean, scalable systems.
  4. Hackathon Designers & Makers who work fast and need instant variable resets.
  5. Anyone tired of manually detaching variables one by one.


🌱 Support the Creator


Built for the community — shaped by your feedback.

We’re constantly testing edge cases and adding features, but bugs can happen.

If you find one, reach out and help make Detacher better.

✨ More powerful features are already in the works.
plugins.tagline: Detach differnet types of variables in a frame safely and effortlessly  !

plugins.name: Promptus
plugins.description:
Promptus is a free Figma plugin that turns text or images into high-quality AI image prompts—all in just seconds, without leaving Figma.


⸻


Available tools

•Text-to-Prompt – type a brief and receive a detailed prompt

•Image-to-Prompt – upload an image and extract the underlying prompt

•One-Click Copy – copy the ready-to-use prompt wherever you need


⸻


Set up your Google Gemini API key in Promptus:


Open Promptus inside Figma.

Click the gear icon (Settings) in the top-right corner of the plugin panel.

Go to Google AI Studio.

Click “Sign in to Google AI Studio” and authenticate with your Google account.

In the top header, click the “Get API Key” button.

When prompted, click “Create API key”.

In the project pop-up, enter a project name (or select an existing one) and confirm.


Thank you for choosing Promptus! 🤩

👉 If you have any questions or suggestions, let us know — your feedback makes all the difference.

plugins.name: Find lost local — «Найти потерянные локальные компоненты»
plugins.description:
🔍 Find lost local automatically catches every local instance whose master component lives in another library / document.

Just set a prefix symbol (default “_”) and choose the search scope—current page or whole file.


Features

•Any nesting depth – detects instances hidden inside local components and their masters.

•Page-level grouping – shows how many problematic components each page contains.

•One-click jump – selects and zooms to the target instance.

•Custom prefix – works with _Tabs, .hidden, -draft, @deprecated, or any symbol you use for local components.


When it helps

•Before publishing a library – make sure no stray local copies remain in the file.

•During a design-system migration – quickly spot legacy components that still point elsewhere.

•While reviewing external files – instantly see what is pulled from external libraries.


How to use

1.Open the plugin and, if needed, change the prefix symbol.

2.Pick Current page or Whole file and click Search.

3.Review the grouped list. Clicking a component name jumps to its first found instance.

4.Items labelled “Outside pages” exist only inside master components; fix them in the corresponding library.


The plugin works entirely inside Figma—no internet access required, and no data ever leaves your account.


🔍 Find lost local автоматически вылавливает в вашем файле любые локальные инстансы, мастеры которых живут в другой библиотеке / документе.

Достаточно указать символ-префикс (по умолчанию — «_») и выбрать область поиска — текущую страницу или весь файл.


Возможности

  1. Любая глубина вложенности: находит инстансы, спрятанные внутри локальных компонентов и их мастеров.
  2. Группировка по страницам с подсчётом, сколько проблемных компонентов найдено на каждой.
  3. Переход одним кликом: выбирает и фокусирует нужный инстанс.
  4. Настраиваемый префикс: работает не только с «_Tabs», но и с «.hidden», «-draft», «@deprecated» — любым символом, который вы используете для локальных компонентов.


Когда пригодится

  1. Перед публикацией библиотеки — убедитесь, что в файле нет «висящих» локальных копий.
  2. Во время миграции компонентов из старой дизайн-системы в новую.
  3. При ревью сторонних файлов, чтобы сразу увидеть, что тянется из внешних библиотек.


Как пользоваться

  1. Откройте плагин и при необходимости поменяйте символ-префикс.
  2. Выберите Текущая страница или Весь файл и нажмите Поиск.
  3. Изучите сгруппированный список. Клик по названию компонента перенесёт вас к первому найденному инстансу.
  4. Компоненты, отмеченные как «Вне страницы», находятся только внутри мастеров — их можно исправить в контексте соответствующей библиотеки.


Плагин не требует интернет-доступа и не отправляет данные за пределы вашего аккаунта Figma.
plugins.tagline: Find all local component instances whose master lives in another file

plugins.name: Auto Layout Checker
plugins.description:
Auto Layout Checker helps you maintain design consistency by identifying and converting elements that don't use Auto Layout. Perfect for cleaning up designs and ensuring layout consistency across your files.


🔍 Key Features:

• Scan entire pages or selected elements for missing Auto Layout

• One-click conversion of frames and groups to Auto Layout

• Clear visual feedback for converted elements

• Theme-aware interface that matches your Figma theme

• Quick navigation to elements through direct selection


🎯 Perfect for:

• Design system cleanup and maintenance

• Legacy file modernization

• Team collaboration and consistency checks

• Quick Auto Layout implementation


💡 How to use:

1. Select elements to scan (or leave unselected to scan entire page)

2. Click "Scan" to find elements without Auto Layout

3. Click any element to navigate to it in your design

4. Use the "Convert" button to instantly apply Auto Layout


The plugin automatically applies sensible Auto Layout defaults:

• Vertical layout orientation

• 10px spacing between elements

• 10px padding on all sides

• Automatic sizing for both axes


Keep your designs maintainable and responsive with Auto Layout Checker!
plugins.tagline: Quickly find and convert elements missing Auto Layout, streamlining your design system consistency.

plugins.name: SaveFrame - Save, Share, and Manage Custom Frames with Ease.
plugins.description:
SaveFrame — Figma Frames, Re imagined!


Tired of Figma’s default frame window? SaveFrame is your modern visual command center for everything frames.

Custom frames, Organize, preview, customize, delete, and share—like never before.


Whether you're documenting designs, building moodboards, or curating visual systems, SaveFrame gives you full creative control. It's what Figma frames should feel like.


✨ Why designers love SaveFrame:


🔍 Instant Frame Previews

  1. No more clicking around. See all your frames at a glance in a clean, scrollable UI.

🧩 Drag & Drop Organization

  1. Sort, group, and build collections effortlessly. Your canvas, your logic.

🧹 Smart Deletion

  1. Clear out what you don’t need—instantly. Delete single frames or full sets with confidence.

📐 Save All the Details

  1. Dimensions, effects, layout, constraints—SaveFrame remembers the stuff that matters.

🎨 Reusable Frame Presets

  1. Create your own frame styles and apply them in one click. Keep your design patterns consistent.

🚀 Seamless Sharing

  1. Export and import frame collections in seconds.
  2. Perfect for sharing with teammates or individuals—no friction, no confusion.

⭐ Favorite Key Frames

  1. Highlight your best work and access it instantly when it counts.

🌗 Light & Dark Mode

  1. A workspace that adapts to your vibe, day or night.



🛠 Built for designers who:

  1. Want more control than Figma gives out of the box
  2. Create and manage multiple frames daily
  3. Build moodboards, docs, and design systems
  4. Hate clutter and love visual clarity
  5. Need a fast way to share organized frames with collaborators


In short:

We took the idea of Figma frames and made it flexible, collaborative, and creator-first.

SaveFrame isn’t just a tool—it’s a better way to work with frames.
plugins.tagline: Figma Frames, Reimagined — Save, Share, and Manage Custom Frames with Ease.

plugins.name: GridVar | Quick Column Grid with Variables
plugins.description:
GridVar helps you create width-based column layout grids with linked variables for any frame width. It automatically generates a set of variables representing different column configurations, including gutters, so you can quickly adjust and find the perfect fit for nested layers.


✨ Key Features:

•Quick Setup: Easily create layout grids with variable-based configurations.

•Flexible Widths: Effortlessly switch between column setups to match your design needs.

•Time-Saving: Eliminate manual calculations and streamline your workflow.


📌 How It Works:

Generated variables are conveniently stored in the "GridVar" variable collection. You can find the column width variables under: [Grid Name]/Columns.


Perfect for designers looking to simplify layout grid handling and enhance their Figma workflow.

plugins.name: Quick styles
plugins.description:
How does the plugin works:


Save a Style

1.Open the plugin library.

2.Select the layer you want to save styles from.

3.Click Save on one of the style slots in the plugin.

4.The style is saved!


Set a Shortcut

1.Open System Settings.

2.Navigate to Keyboard > Keyboard Shortcuts > App Shortcuts.

3.Click on the plus (+) icon.

4.Set the app to Figma in the menu.

5.Type the exact menu title name.

6.Set your shortcut and click Done!


Apply a Style

1.Select any layer.

2.Use the menu item or shortcut to apply styles!

plugins.name: Frame Flow
plugins.description:
The Figma plugin “Frame Flow” allows you to duplicate the selected frame to the right or below with a predefined spacing. In addition to duplication, it also lets you insert blank frames at custom intervals. It’s especially useful when creating presentation documents, as it helps you add pages smoothly without disrupting the layout spacing. Setting up keyboard shortcuts is highly recommended for efficient use.


New Frame

Creates a new empty frame with the specified size.


Add Frame Right

Creates a new empty frame with the specified size to the right of the currently selected frame.

Recommended shortcut: ⌘ + ⌥ (Option) + → (Right Arrow)


Add Frame Below

Creates a new empty frame with the specified size below the currently selected frame.

Recommended shortcut: ⌘ + ⌥ (Option) + ↓ (Down Arrow)


Duplicate Frame Right

Duplicates the currently selected frame to the right.

Recommended shortcut: ⌘ + ⌥ (Option) + ⇧ (Shift) + → (Right Arrow)


Duplicate Frame Below

Duplicates the currently selected frame below.

Recommended shortcut: ⌘ + ⌥ (Option) + ⇧ (Shift) + ↓ (Down Arrow)


Settings

Configure various parameters.




Figmaプラグイン「Frame Flow」は、選択中のフレームを、事前に設定した間隔で右隣や下に複製できるプラグインです。複製のみではなく、白紙のフレームを好きな間隔で配置することも可能です。主に資料作成時、ページの間隔を崩さずスムーズにページを増やしていきたい時に活躍します。ショートカットを設定するのがおすすめです。


New Frame

設定したサイズの空フレームを新規作成します。


Add Frame Right

いま選択しているフレームの右隣に、設定したサイズの空フレームを新規作成します。おすすめショートカットキーは⌘ + ⌥(option) + →(右矢印)です。


Add Frame Below

いま選択しているフレームの下に、設定したサイズの空フレームを新規作成します。おすすめショートカットキーは⌘ + ⌥(option) + ↓(下矢印)です。


Duplicate Frame Right

いま選択しているフレームの右隣に、フレームを複製します。

おすすめショートカットキーは⌘ + ⌥(option) + ⇧(shift) + →(右矢印)です。


Duplicate Frame Below

いま選択しているフレームの下に、フレームを複製します。

おすすめショートカットキーは⌘ + ⌥(option) + ⇧(shift) + ↓(下矢印)です。


Settings

様々な値を設定します。
plugins.tagline: Quickly layout 1920x1080 frames

plugins.name: StyleMe
plugins.description:
"I’ve got a habit of designing tons of projects without color styles—whoops! 😅 And even when I do have styles, I tend to forget about them. 🤦‍♂️ So, I created a plugin that lets me embrace my laziness 🙌 . 🎨 Work smarter, not harder, right? 😉"


🎉 Awesome Features to Keep You Lazy and Stylish:

🕵️‍♀️ Scans your entire document for matching colors—no hunting required!

🎯 Auto-applies styles to elements with exact color matches (magic, right?).

✨ Creates new styles for those sneaky color variants with different opacities.

plugins.name: TextSwapper
plugins.description:
Features


Easily customize text for legal contracts, sales proposals, and resumes in Figma.

Quickly update text without needing extra tools.

Streamlined text replacement for multiple objects, components, and frames.

Simple and intuitive interface for seamless integration with your workflow.

Save time ⏰ and eliminate the hassle of manually editing text in Figma!

How:


Add the word "page" to the name of your page frame (e.g., agreement_page).

Enter the text you want to replace in the "Find text" field (e.g., {company name}).

Enter the new text in the "Replace with" field (e.g., Figma).

Use the "Update" button to replace the specified line, or the "Update All" button to replace all occurrences of the text in your document.

Use the + and - buttons to adjust the number of text fields.

Click Save to store your list of text replacements for faster updates when working on the same document.

Use Load to retrieve your saved list of text replacements and automatically fill in the fields. The current version retrieves only the latest saved list.

Click Download Selected Pages as PDF to download the selected pages as one merged PDF file.
plugins.tagline: Easily customize text for legal contracts, sales proposals, and resumes—no extra tools needed.

plugins.name: CopyCraft
plugins.description:
Streamline your text editing workflow with a powerful tool that helps you manage and edit text content across your Figma designs with precision and ease.

How it Works:


Text Loading:

Select any frame or text element in your Figma document and load it into the editor with a single click.


Smart Organization:

  1. Texts are automatically grouped by their parent elements (Frames, Components, or Groups)
  2. Each text element shows its character count and previous versions
  3. Intuitive interface for quick access to all text elements


Efficient Editing:

  1. Edit multiple text elements simultaneously
  2. Apply text styles directly from the editor
  3. Preview changes in real-time
  4. Navigate quickly to specific elements in your design


Key Features:

  1. Character counter for precise text control
  2. Previous version tracking for each text element
  3. Direct navigation to elements in your design
  4. Batch saving capabilities for groups of text
  5. Support for text styles application


Perfect for teams working on large-scale designs where maintaining text consistency and efficiency in editing is crucial.
plugins.tagline: Text Management Made Simple
